mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.username as username ,a.password as password ,a.xiaozhang_name as xiaozhangName ,a.xiaozhang_phone as xiaozhangPhone ,a.xiaozhang_id_number as xiaozhangIdNumber ,a.xiaozhang_photo as xiaozhangPhoto ,a.sex_types as sexTypes ,a.xiaozhang_email as xiaozhangEmail ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段
FROM xiaozhang a
and a.id in
#{item}
and a.username like CONCAT('%',#{params.username},'%')
and a.password like CONCAT('%',#{params.password},'%')
and a.xiaozhang_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.xiaozhangName},'%')
and a.xiaozhang_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.xiaozhangPhone},'%')
and a.xiaozhang_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.xiaozhangIdNumber},'%')
and a.sex_types = #{params.sexTypes}
and a.xiaozhang_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.xiaozhangEmail},'%')
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
